this is better than the first penumbra game in that it allows you to make progress between save points the story is fairly ridiculous and being completely and utterly defenceless when attacked is downright infuriating some of the puzzles are good and will challenge you as the game progresses it feels increasingly contrived with a senseless excursion through endless obstacles only to arrive back at a previously visited room im not condemning the game but ive played far better
